name: Keto Jalapeno Popper Chicken Casserole
author: Jane Kazaryan
summary: This keto jalapeno popper casserole is so good! Spicy, but oh so yummy!
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) can diced jalapenos (such as Ortega®)
1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spray a casserole dish with cooking spray
Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Drain bacon slices on paper towels
Mix 1/2 of the bacon crumbles with 1/2 of the Cheddar cheese, jalapenos, sour cream, mayonnaise, and garlic salt
Pour mixture into the prepared casserole dish and spread evenly
Top with remaining bacon and cheese
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and casserole is heated through, about 30 minutes
